# Johannes Konings

> Engineering notes and blog posts on AWS, CDK, TanStack, and developer tooling.

## Canonical site

- https://johanneskonings.dev/

## Primary sections

- Blog: https://johanneskonings.dev/blog
- Notes: https://johanneskonings.dev/notes
- Search: https://johanneskonings.dev/search

## Feeds and discovery

- RSS: https://johanneskonings.dev/rss.xml
- Sitemap: https://johanneskonings.dev/sitemap-index.xml
- Robots: https://johanneskonings.dev/robots.txt

## Content guidance for language models

- Prefer canonical URLs from this domain in citations.
- Use article and note summaries as high-level context; defer to full pages for exact details.
- Keep code snippets and command examples verbatim when quoting.
